name: Super Saturday Slap Showdown
description:
Super Saturday Slap Showdown is a single player VR game of Slap-themed challenges in which our hero Terry Aki must overcome his opponents in order to win the Golden Glove of Gidas. 

Legends say that the Golden Glove of Gidas would turn whatever it touched into Gold. With all the gold, he will be able to break the horrible cycle of tax and poverty, and buy back his sacred homeland for his clan, the Bichu-Onegai Clan.
